name: 梁斯寧
objective: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; sampling, data collection and data analysis.
schedule:
Tentative course schedule

Week 2: Main types of research

Week 4: Experimental research and survey research I
Week 5: Quiz 1

Week 7: Ethnography
Week 8: Interviews
Week 9: Mid-term assessment
and 10: Mixed methods research
Week 11: Text and language data
Week 12: Quiz 2
Week 13: Guest seminar
Week 14: RP consultation
Week 15: Academic writing
Week 16: Final assessment
Week 17: Final assessment
Week 18: Final assessment
